name: paper frenzy [7/10 VMJ2020]
description:
your goal is to fill the progress bar by eating other fish but watch out do not get eaten by other fish that has bigger size than you

you only able to eat a fish that has the same size as you or has a lower size than you, your fish will get bigger at some point in your progress bar

a fish will randomly spawn around you and they will despawn after 5 seconds, so you need to be fast,  sometimes a fish will spawn in front of your face watch out

Github repositories https://github.com/alvian0/paper-frenzy

made for day 7 of https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020, following this theme:

I interpreted the 7th game theme as a fish because for me its really looks like a fish seriously
